articles.author: Allison Morrow
articles.title: Trump’s housing plan casts Wall Street as the villain. He’s got the wrong guy - CNN
articles.description: President Donald Trump, like any politician whose polling is in the gutter, is desperate for a villain — any villain — to blame for America’s affordability woes. Enter Wall Street.
articles.content:
A version of this story appeared in CNN Business Nightcap newsletter. To get it in your inbox, sign up for free here.
